quote:

I was so impressed with Joshua’s attention to the creative process, staying aligned with my brand, his attention to detail - not to mention how quickly the website was completed. He gave me so many ideas and inspiration in terms of layout, colour, content, as well as the important commercial aspects of the project. The finished website, with online bookings and payments, is going to streamline the way I do business and save me so much time and money.

Joshua was a pleasure to work with - his professionalism, communication, responsiveness and patience were all exceptional and beyond compare. If I could give more than 5 stars I would!
